job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongJOB DESCRIPTIONstrongppDoron Precision Systems Inc is a world leader in driving simulation systems and now has an opening for a fulltime Software Engineer in Binghamton New YorkppbrppstrongREQUIREMENTSstrongpulliBachelors degree in Engineering or Computer Science is requiredlili24 years related experienceliliDesign and programming experience with C C OOP Microsoft Visual StudioliliSoftware development experience both in a team environment as well as working independentlyliliSignificant experience with Windows UI and application developmentliliExperience with Interface Control Requirements and DocumentationliliBackground in realtime simulation andor game developmentliliSome minimal travel may be requiredliulpbrppstrongPREFERREDstrongpulliWorking knowledge of vehicle dynamicsliliExperience interfacing to IO hardware and realtime control loopsliliExperience developing and working with distributed network applicationsliulpbrppstrongJOB DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIESstrongpulliResponsible for the research design and writing of software for Company ProductsliliSupportsinstalls software applicationssystemsliliTests new and existing software for faults and corrects any deficienciesliliModifies existing programs by analyzing and identifying areas for modification and improvementliulpbrppbrppbrppbrppbrppbrppbrppbrppbrppbrppbrppbrppbrppbrppbrppbrppbrppbrppbrppbrppbrp
